meanings.definition: The territories or jurisdictions of a thane.
meanings.sent1: The thanedoms were vast lands ruled by the thane.
meanings.sent2: The thanedoms were divided among the powerful thanes.
meanings.sent3: The thanedoms were so large that even the birds needed maps to navigate.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, each pawn dreams of becoming a thanedom, ruling over the board.
meanings.sent5: The thanedoms stretched far and wide, like a colorful quilt covering the land.

meanings.definition: The rank or office of a thane.
meanings.sent1: She aspired to reach the thanedom and lead with honor.
meanings.sent2: The thanedom was a position of great respect in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The thanedom came with a shiny badge and a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the thanedom was equivalent to being the leader of the league.
meanings.sent5: His thanedom was marked by the golden seal of the king, a symbol of his authority.
